name: Swift Blink
description: A cunning blade able to anticipate and enable its bearer's movements.

abilities.name: Swift Blink
abilities.description: Instantly teleports the wielder towards the targeted point. After the teleportation, grants the caster phased movement, increased movement speed, and bonus agility for a while.
notes: When targeting a point within 1200 distance, teleports directly onto the targeted point
When targeting a point beyond 1200 distance, teleports 1200 distance towards the targeted point instead
Incoming projectiles are disjointed upon teleporting
Doubletap targets a point in front of the team's Fountain
Taking more than 0 damage from any other player or Roshan (after reductions and not flagged as HP Removal) puts the item on a fixed cooldown
Cannot be reset with cooldown reset sources
Shares cooldown with Blink Dagger, Overwhelming Blink, and Arcane Blink

additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant 25 attack speed and 4.17 main armor
25 main attack damage to Agility heroes
11.25 main attack damage to Universal heroes
